1978 aandukrama wyawasthawa saha daha hathwani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanayath asathbhawayen aarambha kala de nisa nogalapena bawa mathiwarana komasaris dayananda dishanayaka mahatha kiyayi.komasariswaraya ese pawasuwe mathiwarana mahalekam karyalayedi pasugiyada (3) pawathi madhya hamuwe diya.janapathiwarana prathipala prakasha kirime awasthawe siya kathawedi chanda petti aaraksha kirimata bari yayi kisiwiteka kiya nathayida komasariswaraya kiya.aathathiyata lakwuna yayi oba prakasha kala nedayi madhyawedingen asu prashnayata pilithuru demin komasariswaraya “aathathiyata lakwenne nadda me wage katakatha kiwama” yayi kiweya.komasariswarayagen asana lada prashna ha pilithuru kihipayak meseya.prashnaya - ganan karana niladharinta paharadi athayi wipakshaya kiya thibenawa.pilithura - ganan kirime madhyasthana parishrayedi siduwu de shalawata sambandha naha.
